sentences.en: Cruz had to scavenge information from newspapers and journals.
sentences.cn: 克鲁兹不得不从报纸和杂志中搜寻信息。

sentences.en: ESR spectrum approved that natural SOD and · OH scavenger could scavenge · OH in the system.
sentences.cn: 利用顺磁共振(ESR)技术证实,加入活性SOD或·OH清除剂可淬灭体系中·OHESR信号.

sentences.en: GPX is able to scavenge ROS, eliminate lipid peroxide and protect against cell membrane damage.
sentences.cn: 硒酶GPX具有还原ROS, 抗脂质过氧化,保护细胞膜的作用.

sentences.en: Mimi loves to play scavenge hunt.
sentences.cn: 米咪喜欢玩寻找棉球的游戏.

sentences.en: Scavenge filtration and cloth washing at the end of each cycle.
sentences.cn: 清除滤清和布料洗涤在各个周期的结束.

sentences.en: The fish and crabs scavenge for decaying tissue.
sentences.cn: 鱼和蟹搜寻腐烂的组织为食.

sentences.en: The foxes come and scavenge the bones.
There are people who live in the dump and scavenge garbage for a living.
sentences.cn: 有些人生活在垃圾场，以捡破烂为生。

sentences.en: You can often scavenge nice bits of old furniture from skips.
sentences.cn: 从废物堆里往往能捡到一些挺好的旧家具.

words.tran_cn: 食腐动物；清道夫；[助剂] 清除剂；拾荒者

trans.tran_en: if an animal scavenges, it eats anything that it can find

trans.tran_cn: 清除污物，打扫，（在废物中）寻觅，（动物）食腐肉
